Pg Title: SonicWall Loyalty and Trade-in Program is one of the most aggressive and rewarding in the industry.
Pg Descr: It's extremely affordable and rewarding to upgrade a SonicWall firewall. When you take advantage of our Secure Upgrade Plus or Competitive Trade-In, you’ll enjoy special savings on next-generation firewalls (NGFWs) or Unified Threat Management (UTM) firewalls. Save in the long run by protecting your organization from the latest threats in real time while simultaneously speeding up your network. Upgrade and gain on-the-fly SSL decryption, tightly integrated Intrusion Prevention System (IPS), sophisticated anti-evasion technology and network-based malware protection.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall firewalls are equipped with our patented "reassembly-free deep packet inspection engine " so you can block the latest threats the moment they emerge.

Pg Title: SonicWall rewards loyalty with another customer advantage program: Secure Upgrade Plus.
Pg Descr: SonicWall's aggressive and generous trade-in programs like Secure Upgrade Plus makes upgrading easy. Don’t live with old equipment - upgrade and keep up with the growing cyber-threats. Don't just detect breaches, prevent them. Stop ransomware, encrypted threats and phishing attacks with SonicWall. See how we can help you do more business and fear less.
Feature Img Descr: Secure Upgrade Plus is designed for current, qualifying SonicWall customers who wish to upgrade from older SonicWall appliances, as well as those who want to trade in appliances from other manufacturers.

Pg Title: SonicWall Competitive Advantage Program offers new and current customers a straightforward way to get upgrades and competitive trade-ins.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Customer Advantage Program offers an upgrade path from current SonicWall products, and a trade-in path from competitors’ products. Take advantage of special pricing on a wide range of SonicWall products. This offer recognizes the past investments that customers have made and helps them maintain optimal security by letting them easily and affordably replace outdated security appliances.
Feature Img Descr: Customers who purchase comprehensive subscription services and support options when upgrading a SonicWall product or trading in a competitive product can save up to 50 percent on the total annual cost.

Pg Title: SonicWall Legal Notices - including terms of use, licensing, privacy, patents, trademarks, copyrights, and other notices.

Pg Title: 2018 SonicWall Cyber Threat Report - this is a must read for anyone concerned about safe and secure online access.
Pg Descr: SonicWall's 2018 Cyber Threat Report for a detailed look at the number and nature of cyber-attacks through the year. The fact is, the threats and dangers we face are never static. Cyber-crime is an ever changing landscape as criminals shift tactics and exploit weaknesses.
Feature Img Descr: Arm yourself with the Power of Knowing: read this 2018 Cyber-Threat Report and learn about the dangers SonicWall has been fighting for nearly 30 years.

Pg Title: SonicWall Capture Labs gathers, analyzes, and disseminates cross-vector threat information via the SonicWall Capture Threat Network.

The Capture Labs team gathers and analyzes information from more than 1 million security sensors located in nearly 200 countries. Our cross-vector threat information is shared throughout the SonicWall Capture Threat Network.

Pg Title: SonicWall E-Rate video series for the benefit of applicants.

SonicWall firewalls and services are tailored for K-12 environments, our suite of networking security products are cost-effective, easy to use, manage and deploy. E-Rate makes it easier to stay current and effective.

Pg Title: SonicWall NSS Labs Firewall is validated and recommended by the 2018 NGFW Group Test.
Pg Descr: NSS Labs Group Test put SonicWall's Nsa 2650 firewall through the paces and found it to be effective in stopping cyber-threats across all vectors. This achievement puts SonicWall in an exclusive class of cyber-security options for any organization with any sized-footprint.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Nsa 2650 Firewall earned a "recommended" rating, placing SonicWall among a small group of companies that can stop all cyber-threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall security bundle infographic shows what's at stake from rising cyber-attacks.

Feature Img Descr: SonicWall's analysts put together this infographic to show the global increases in all forms of attacks. Download now.

As a trusted new source for India, there was deep concern that any attack could damage their reputation. They turned to SonicWall to make sure that attack never happened.

Pg Title: Take SonicWall's phishing IQ test.

Pg Title: Have you taken SonicWall's phishing IQ test?
Pg Descr: More than 90 percent of cyber-attacks start with a phishing email. Can you tell the difference between email that's legitimate and ones that are phishing for your information? Take the SonicWall test and see how hard it is to tell.
Feature Img Descr: Take this test and see how easy (or hard) it is to tell the difference between legitimate email and phishing.

Pg Title: SonicWall Cloud Security is scalable, cutting-edge security for multi-cloud environments.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security provides API-based security for software as a service (SaaS) delivering visibility, data security, advanced threat protection and compliance. Leverage familiar and trusted security to protect your infrastructure, workloads and applications in public and private cloud. SonicWall NSv delivers award winning next-gen firewall capabilities to protect infrastructure as a service (IaaS) and software defined data center (SDDC).
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security provides API-based security for infrastructure, workloads, and applications in public and private cloud.

Pg Title: SonicWall Next-Gen Cloud App Security for Office 365, G Suite and other SaaS apps.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security offers next-gen security for your users and data within cloud applications, including email, messaging, file sharing and file storage. For organizations adopting SaaS applications, SonicWall Cloud App Security delivers best-in-class security and a seamless user experience.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security offers next-gen security for organizations adopting SaaS applications,

Pg Title: SonicWall NSv secures your private cloud with next-generation Cloud Security technology.
Pg Descr: SonicWall NSv is the virtual form of our Next-generation firewall, delivering the same features and functionality of the physical firewall to secure your virtual data centers and private cloud instances. Available on VMWare ESXi platform, NSv offers agility to evolve based on your ever-changing business needs.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall NSv is a virtual next-generation firewall available on VMWare ESXi platform.

Pg Title: SonicWall Next-generation firewalls offer real-time protection and best-in-class security for your public cloud workloads.
Pg Descr: Attain best-in-class security for the constantly evolving threats in public cloud. Rely on SonicWall Next-generation firewalls to protect your public cloud instances from zero-day threats and gain complete visibility and control over your virtual traffic from a single pane of glass. Platform support includes AWS and Azure.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Next-generation firewalls control virtual traffic from a single pane of glass.

Pg Title: SonicWall Capture Client endpoint security blocks malware and enforces access and content rules.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Capture Client endpoint security is a unified client platform that delivers multiple endpoint protection capabilities, including next-generation malware protection and support for visibility into encrypted traffic. It leverages cloud sandbox file testing, comprehensive reporting, and enforcement for endpoint protection. Additionally, provide consistent assurance of client security, with easy-to-use and actionable intelligence and reporting.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Capture Client is a unified client platform that provides proven reliability with easy-to-use and actionable intelligence and reporting.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewalls give you comprehensive threat prevention at multi-gigabit speeds.
Pg Descr: SonicWall next-generation firewalls give you the network security, control and visibility your organization needs to innovate and grow quickly. When you build with SonicWall, you create a complete high-performance security solution that scales to fit your needs.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall's award-winning hardware and virtual firewalls integrate tightly with a broad range of products, services and technologies.

Pg Title: SonicWall high-performance firewalls as an integrated threat prevention platform for small/medium organizations and distributed enterprises.
Pg Descr: Get high-speed threat prevention in a flexible, integrated security solution with the SonicWall TZ Series. Designed for small networks and distributed enterprises with remote and branch locations, the TZ Series offers five different models that can be tuned to meet your specific needs. Advanced networking and management features such as Secure SD-WAN and Zero-Touch Deployment make it easy to bring up new sites as you need.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall TZ series offer optional capabilities including PoE/PoE+ support and 802.11ac WiFi that protects your network and data from the latest threats over wired and wireless connections.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewalls are scalable, cutting-edge security that leverages the power of cloud intelligence.
Pg Descr: The SonicWall Network Security services platform (NSsp) High-End Firewall series takes an innovative approach to threat detection and prevention by combining appliance-based protection with cloud intelligence in a reliable, high-performance platform. Our scalable, cutting-edge security leverages the power of cloud intelligence so you can defend your network against the most advanced threats without slowing performance.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Network Security Services Platform (NSsp) is designed for large distributed enterprises, data centers and service providers.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewalls give you advanced threat prevention in a high-performance security platform.
Pg Descr: The SonicWall Network Security appliance (NSa) Mid-Range Firewall series consolidates automated advanced threat prevention technologies in a mid-range next-generation firewall platform. Built on a multi-core hardware architecture featuring 10-GbE and 2.5-GbE interfaces, the NSa series scales to meet the performance demands of mid-sized networks, branch offices and distributed enterprises.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall's NSa series firewalls feature cloud-based and on-box capabilities like real-time visualization and WLAN management.

Pg Title: SonicWall access points supported by firewall model.
Pg Descr: Access points supported per SonicWall firewall by firewall model. From the entry-level SOHO series to the SuperMassive 9000 series, this chart shows the flexibility for each model.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewalls with next-generation cloud security and SPOG management.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Network Security virtual (NSv) series brings SonicWall’s industry leading Next-Generation Firewall (NGFW) capabilities to protect your workloads in the cloud from threats, with automated, real-time breach detection and protection. Featuring SPOG - "single pane of glass" management of all functions and features, all from one app.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Next-generation cloud security for multi-cloud environments managed centrally from a single pane of glass (SPOG).

Pg Title: SonicWall firewall gateway security services give you more protection and greater flexibility.
Pg Descr: SonicWall gateway security services turn your firewall into a complete security solution. Add SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite (AGSS) bundle to get the protection and productivity essentials your network needs. Or, choose from a host of services, such as Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP), Gateway Anti-Virus, Intrusion Prevention, Content Filtering Service and more.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall gateway security services allow you to choose from a host of services, such as Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP), Gateway Anti-Virus, Intrusion Prevention, Content Filtering Service and more.

Pg Title: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) service stops zero-day and ransomware at the gateway.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) service stops unknown, zero-day attacks such as ransomware at the gateway with automated remediation. This cloud-based multi-engine sandbox analyzes suspicious code to help discover and block newly developed malware from entering your network.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection cloud-based multi-engine secure service analyzes suspicious code and blocks newly developed malware from entering your network.

Pg Title: SonicWall Capture Client is a unified endpoint platform for today’s threat landscape.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Capture Client is a unified client platform that delivers multiple endpoint protection capabilities, including next-generation malware protection and support for visibility into encrypted traffic. It leverages cloud sandbox file testing, comprehensive reporting, and enforcement for endpoint protection. Additionally, provide consistent assurance of client security, with easy-to-use and actionable intelligence and reporting.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Capture Client is a unified client platform that leverages cloud sandbox file testing, comprehensive reporting, and enforcement for endpoint protection.

Pg Title: SonicWall Content Filtering Client (CFC) Granular web policies to restrict objectionable web content for roaming devices.
Pg Descr: SonicWall CFC compares requested websites against a massive database in the cloud containing millions of rated URLs, IP addresses and web sites. It provides administrators with the tools to create and apply policies that allow or deny access to sites based on individual or group identity, or by time of day, for over 50 predefined categories.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Content Filtering Client gives you full-time secure filtering of all content.

Pg Title: SonicWall Content Filtering Services (CFS) enforces granular web policies to restrict objectionable, unproductive or unsecure web content.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Content Filtering Services (CFS) compares requested web sites against a massive database in the cloud containing millions of rated URLs, IP addresses and web sites. It provides administrators with the tools to create and apply policies that allow or deny access to sites based on individual or group identity, or by time of day, for over 50 pre-defined categories.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Content Filtering Services provides administrators with the tools they need to create and apply policies that meet business and industry requirements.

Pg Title: SonicWall's Content Filtering Rating Categories is based on decades of monitoring and observation of online behavior.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Web Content Filtering Service blocks inappropriate, unproductive, illegal and malicious web content, and is trusted by SonicWall customers.

Pg Title: SonicWall security bundles combine essential security, productivity and support capabilities in one convenient package
Pg Descr: Get complete network security in a single convenient bundle. SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite combines the essential security, application control and visualization capabilities to protect your network, all covered by 24x7 technical support. Add the power of a next-generation firewall with the TotalSecure Advanced Edition.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Advanced Gateway Security Suite gives you a complete network security in a single convenient bundle.

Pg Title: SonicWall WAN Acceleration helps you significantly enhance application transfer performance and increase employee productivity.
Pg Descr: Eliminate performance bottlenecks from data and file sharing applications and give users LAN-like application performance, with SonicWall WAN optimization (WXA). Our WAN solution optimizes the bandwidth you already have by transmitting only new or changed data. Minimize and prioritize app traffic when you integrate WXA software or virtual appliance with a SonicWall firewall.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall WAN Acceleration (WXA) solutions optimize the bandwidth you already have.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewall provide superior, high-speed secure wireless solutions suitable for any business.
Pg Descr: SonicWall wireless network security products provides you with an enhanced wireless user experience by delivering the performance, range and reliability of 802.11ac and 802.11n wireless technology with the SonicWave and SonicPoint series access points. Benefit from advanced, industry-leading, patented security and wireless features. Ease deployment and management, at a low total cost of ownership.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall wireless network security products gives you patented security and wireless features with easy deployment and management.

Pg Title: SonicWall offers SonicPoint for high performance security for mobile networks.
Pg Descr: The SonicPoint Wireless Security Access Point Series creates a secure wireless network that safeguards your wireless traffic from threats and optimizes performance. Create a wireless network security solution that delivers wired-like network security and performance by combining SonicPoint Series 802.11ac wireless access points with industry-leading SonicWall firewalls.
Feature Img Descr: SonicPoint Wireless Security Access Point Series gives you wireless network security solution that delivers wired-like network security and performance.

Pg Title: SonicWall firewalls offer high-speed next-generation connectivity with greater security and flexibility.
Pg Descr: The SonicWall SonicWave Series of high-speed wireless access points delivers the performance, range and reliability of 802.11ac Wave 2 technology. Ideal for indoor and outdoor environments, the SonicWave Series tightly integrates with SonicWall next-generation firewalls to create a wireless network security solution that ensures wireless traffic is secured from network threats.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall SonicWave Firewall Series ensures wireless traffic is secured from network threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall management and analytics increases the total visibility, knowledge and control of your security ecosystem
Pg Descr: SonicWall provides single sign-on access to a simple, common security management platform, from any location and any web-enabled device. Administrators can centrally license, provision and manage their security ecosystem, including network, endpoint, email, mobile and cloud security services, across deployments of various sizes.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall provides single sign-on access into a common security management platform, from any authorized web-enabled device to license, provision and manage the security ecosystem.

Pg Title: SonicWall Analytics transforms data into actionable information.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Analytics is a powerful SPOG management tool that provides intelligence-driven analytics with real-time visualization, monitoring and alerting. Correlated security data through a single pane of glass. Real-time insights and actionable analytics empowers security teams, analysts and stakeholders to discover, interpret and prioritize security data to make informed decisions and take appropriate defensive actions.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Analytics presents SPOG management tool for real-time visualization for intelligence-driven monitoring of secure data through a single pane of glass.

Pg Title: SonicWall offers true SPOG management for cloud-delivered unified management and analytics.
Pg Descr: SonicWall offers Capture Security Center as a true SPOG (single-pane-of-glass) management tool for the entire SonicWall infrastructure. It's scalable cloud security management software delivered as a cost-effective as-a-service. It offers the ultimate in visibility, agility and capacity to govern the entire SonicWall security operations and services with greater clarity, precision and speed – all from a single pane of glass.
Feature Img Descr: Capture Security Center is a SPOG management tool that provides the ultimate in visibility, agility and capacity to govern the entire SonicWall security operations – all from a single pane of glass.

Pg Title: SonicWall Global Management System (GMS) provides a holistic approach to security governance, compliance and risk management.
Pg Descr: The powerful, intuitive SonicWall Global Management System allows you deploy and centrally manage SonicWall firewall, wireless, email security, secure remote access and Dell X-Series (GMS) solutions. Benefit from real-time monitoring – along with comprehensive firewall security policy and compliance reporting – in a solution that can be deployed as software or a virtual appliance.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Global Management System is a central management tool for SonicWall firewall, wireless, email security, secure remote access and Dell X-Series solutions.

Pg Title: SonicWall Analyzer security and application traffic analytics, visualization and reporting tools at your fingertips.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Analyzer is a web-based traffic analytics and reporting tool. It is easy to use and provides real-time and historical insight into network health, performance and security. Analyzer presents detailed traffic analysis and granular security reporting to security teams or incident responders, so they can actively monitor and prevent critical network and security events before serious problems occur.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Analyzer is easy to use for real-time and historical insight into network health, performance and security.

Pg Title: SonicWall Secure Mobile Access (SMA) so you can deliver anytime, any device and any application.
Pg Descr: Empower your workforce with mobility and BYOD, and simplify access management when moving to the cloud. SonicWall Secure Mobile Access is a unified secure access gateway that provides best-in-class SSL VPN, context aware device authorization, application level VPN and advanced authentication with federated single sign-on (SSO) for cloud and on-premises resources.
Feature Img Descr: Empower your workforce with mobility and BYOD, and simplify access management when moving to the cloud.

Pg Title: SonicWall Secure Mobile Access (SMA) for enforced secure access to data center, SaaS and cloud resources
Pg Descr: SonicWall Secure Mobile Access (SMA) is a unified secure access gateway that enables organization to provide anytime, anywhere and any device access to any application. SMA’s granular access control policy engine, context-aware device authorization, application-level VPN and advanced authentication with single sign-on enable organizations to move to the cloud with ease, and embrace BYOD and mobility in a hybrid IT environment.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Secure Mobile Access gives you a unified secure gateway to provide access anytime, anywhere, and any device.

Pg Title: SonicWall Central Management Server (CMS) is a powerful administrative platform for secure access management.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Central Management Server (CMS) provides organizations, distributed enterprises and service providers with a powerful and intuitive solution to centrally manage and rapidly deploy secure access solutions. CMS can be deployed in your private cloud as virtual appliance, or on a public cloud using bring your own license (BYOL) on Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Central Management Server can be deployed in your private cloud as virtual appliance, or on a public cloud using your own license on Amazon Web Services.

Pg Title: SonicWall VPN Client is a safe policy-enforced secure access to mission-critical applications and data.
Pg Descr: SonicWall VPN Client provides your employees safe, easy access to the data and resources they need to be productive from a range of devices, including iOS, OS X, Android, Chrome OS, Kindle Fire and Windows. At the same time, ensure that your corporate network is protected from unauthorized access and mobile security threats.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall VPN Client equips your employees safe, easy access to the data and resources they need to be productive.

Pg Title: SonicWall Email Security provides comprehensive inbound and outbound protection against advanced email threats.
Pg Descr: Email is the most common threat vector used by cyber criminals. SonicWall Email Security provides a multi-layered protection against advanced threats such as targeted phishing attacks, ransomware, business email compromise (BEC) and email fraud. The solution also enables organizations to enforce encryption, data loss prevention and compliance policies to protect sensitive data from leaving your network.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Email Security provides a multi-layered protection to protect sensitive data from leaving your network.

Pg Title: SonicWall Hosted Email Security advanced cloud email security service protects against today's advanced email threats.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Hosted Email Security is an advanced cloud email security service that protects networks where they are most vulnerable. Email is the most common threat vector used by cyber criminals. Deploy the cloud service that protects your organization from advanced email threats such as targeted phishing attacks, ransomware, business email compromise (BEC) and email fraud. SonicWall solution reduces administrative overhead through easy deployment, management and reporting.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Hosted Email Security is an advanced cloud email security service that protects your network from advanced email threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall Email Security appliances offer multi-layered solutions that protect against advanced email threats.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Email Security appliances are ideal for organizations that need a dedicated on-premises solution. SonicWall's solution can be deployed as a hardened physical appliance, robust virtual appliance or software application. The multi-layered solution provides comprehensive inbound and outbound protection, and defends against advanced email-borne threats such as ransomware, zero-day threats, spear phishing and business email compromise (BEC).
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Email Security appliances defends against advanced email-borne threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall Web Application Firewall (WAF) Series delivers web applications safely and at high-speed without disruption.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Web Application Firewall (WAF) Series features advanced web security tools and services to keep compliance data unexposed and web properties safe, undisrupted and in peak performance. It applies Layer-7 application delivery capabilities that enable application-aware load balancing, SSL offloading and acceleration for resilience and an enhanced digital engagement and experience.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Web Application firewalls applies Layer-7 application delivery for an enhanced digital engagement and experience.

Pg Title: SonicWall provides an advanced multi-layer approach to protect against advanced threats, smarter attacks, and crypto-jacking.
Pg Descr: With the rising costs of mining cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, hackers develop and distribute malware to make victims do it for them. SonicWall prevents crypto-jacking software from being downloaded and spreading throughout the network through the power of our next-generation multi-layered technology chain of security devices and services
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall makes it more difficult for attacks like crypto-jacking software from gaining a foothold into your network.

Pg Title: SonicWall defends your network against advanced threats and smarter email threats.
Pg Descr: SonicWall solutions defend networks against advanced threats and smarter email threats. Email is the most common threat vector used by cyber criminals. Over 90% of cyber-attacks start with a successful phishing campaign. Email attacks have evolved to be highly targeted. Hackers typically engage in social engineering tactics to study the victim and craft personalized phishing messages. Email is also the most common delivery mechanism for ransomware and zero-day threats.
Feature Img Descr: Email threats are your weakest vector - plug it with SonicWall.

Pg Title: SonicWall Deep Packet Inspection fights advanced threats and smarter encrypted threats.
Pg Descr: Fight advanced threats and smarter encrypted threats. Gain visibility and safeguard your network from encrypted threats with SonicWall Deep Packet Inspection of TLS, SSL and SSH (DPI-SSL), available as an add-on service on all SonicWall firewalls. DPI-SSL delivers deep protection against encrypted threats across a broad array of encryption protocols, and scalable SSL decryption and inspection performance without limitation.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall delivers deep protection against encrypted threats and scalable SSL decryption and inspection performance without limitation.

Pg Title: SonicWall watches for advanced threats and fileless malware with behavior-based defenses.
Pg Descr: Fileless attacks compromise installed applications to evade file-and signature-based defenses. SonicWall Capture Client stops fileless attacks by continuously monitoring the behavior on endpoints, and can roll back PCs to their prior uninfected state.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall can put a stop to advanced threats and smarter attacks, like fileless malware.

Pg Title: SonicWall offers solutions for advanced threats: smarter ransomware protection with multi-layer endpoint security.
Pg Descr: SonicWall offers protection solutions for advanced threats like ransomware with multi-layered security services. Fight threats with robust endpoint security, next-gen firewall services, email security and secure mobile access. Eradicate known, new and updated ransomware variants, and roll back endpoints to their prior clean state.
Feature Img Descr: Eliminate threats with advanced multi-layered security services with smarter ransomware protection.

Pg Title: SonicWall NSa Series Firewalls detect and prevent cyberattacks across wired, wireless and mobile networks.
Pg Descr: SonicWall NSa Series Firewalls give organizations high-speed secure access to resources over wired, wireless and mobile networks. Employees benefit with greater speed and safer environments through wired and wireless access points. Secure Mobile Access appliances can extend breach detection and prevention seamlessly across your wired, wireless and mobile networks.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall solutions – including NSa series firewalls, SonicWave wireless access points, and Secure Mobile Access appliances – can extend breach detection and prevention seamlessly across your wired, wireless and mobile networks.

Pg Title: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) stops advanced threats through identification, testing, and behavior monitoring.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) eliminates evasive advanced threats by combining the power of the next-generation multi-layered technology chain of security services. This harmony of hardware and software eradicates known and unknown threats, such as newly developed and updated ransomware variants, using our multi-engine network sandbox.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection harmonizes hardware and software to eradicate cyber-threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall cyber-security solutions meet all government and industry requirements and certifications.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Cyber Security Solutions by industry and based on the unique requirements and regulatory mandates of specific industries, including Small and Medium-sized businesses (SMBs), K-12 education, higher education, national security and safety, state and local government, retail and hospitality, financial services, healthcare, and others. Includes end-to-end solutions to protect businesses from ransomware, encrypted threats, zero-day attacks. Protect students from malicious or inappropriate content, real-time breach prevention, Suite-B cryptography. Compliance with FIPS, PCI for POS connections, and HIPAA.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Cyber Security Solutions are in compliance with specific industry mandates, including Suite-B cryptography, FIPS, PCI for POS connections, and HIPAA.

Pg Title: SonicWall has a long history providing security for carriers and data center providers.
Pg Descr: Carrier networks rely on SonicWall to provide agile, scalable, and manageable security. We build flexible, cost-effective and, most importantly, absolutely secure solutions. With stringent uptime requirements to deliver enhanced and reliable voice, video and data center services, carriers need a partner like SonicWall to provide resilient network security solutions to meet their massive data and capacity requirements.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall works with data center providers all over the world to keep them secure from today’s prolific threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall provide wireless access and security to any number of sites.
Pg Descr: Distributed enterprises rely on cloud services, high-speed WANs, wireless and mobile telecommunications to link headquarters with branch/campus sites, POS systems and mobile endpoints. SonicWall solutions comprehensively protect distributed ecosystems from advanced threats, enable regulatory compliance, and are easily and affordably deployed and managed from a SPOG (single pane of glass).
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall solutions that protect your distributed ecosystem are affordably priced and easily managed from a single pane of glass.

Pg Title: SonicWall offers real-time breach prevention for financial services - the world's most targeted industry.
Pg Descr: Because cyber criminals globally are financially and even politically motivated, cyber security threats in the financial sector must be tackled comprehensively. Trusted by more than 6,000 financial services organizations worldwide, SonicWall delivers robust, manageable network information security in financial services, with solutions that extend protection of network resources down to the branch level.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall cyber-security solutions are trusted by more than 6,000 financial services organizations worldwide.

Pg Title: SonicWall safeguards patient data and privacy, without sacrificing network efficiency.
Pg Descr: Over 13,000 healthcare organizations worldwide rely on SonicWall to meet compliance requirements through our advanced network security solutions. Ensure robust healthcare cyber security by providing constant protection and extended connectivity while eliminating downtime. Easy-to-use, cost-effective SonicWall solutions improve network efficiency and minimize cyber security risks in healthcare.
Feature Img Descr: Over 13,000 healthcare organizations worldwide rely on SonicWall to meet data safety and security compliance requirements.

Pg Title: SonicWall can help you deploy massively scalable protection for your entire university-college network system.
Pg Descr: For higher education, success means leveraging technology aggressively both in and out of the classroom. Tools such as Internet2, social, cloud, mobile and web-based applications are providing professors and researchers the means for greater engagement and collaboration. SonicWall offers tools to enhance network performance while you meet security challenges that your IT security team must address.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall gives higher education the tools they need to optimize network performance and security challenges.

Pg Title: SonicWall's robust, deep-level security secures school networks, email systems and budgets.
Pg Descr: Technology is transforming the learning experience at an unprecedented rate. Educators are bringing new tools into the classroom to improve learning, while administrators are finding innovative ways to optimize and drive efficiencies. Today, more than 3,000 districts and schools rely on SonicWall to deliver security and network access.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall offers proven and effective cyber-safe solutions for K12 education.

Pg Title: SonicWall offers E-Rate funding to assist in buying cyber security solutions.
Pg Descr: Cyber security issues are challenging for K-12 IT network managers trying to protect their student and faculty data while ensuring a safe, technology-savvy learning environment. SonicWall eliminates these challenges with a ‘Fear Less’ approach. Tailored for K-12 environments, our suite of networking security products are cost-effective, easy to use, manage and deploy.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall has been fighting cybercrime for nearly 30 years. We can help K-12 eliminate challenges with a ‘Fear Less’ approach.

Pg Title: Deploy government-certified security for operational reliability and program success.
Pg Descr: SonicWall is committed to continuous research and innovation that advance our security solutions to empower government agencies to meet cyber security safeguarding requirements and procedures. Our federally certified technologies qualify SonicWall network security solutions and services for use and deployment within intelligence as well as military organizations.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall offers proven solution for safeguarding government agencies and businesses that do business with government.

Pg Title: SonicWall complies with all Federal Government Certifications.
Pg Descr: SonicWall owns intellectual property that allow it to comply with Federal government certifications, including inter-agency and Department of Defense requirements. Our patented processes affect packet processing that is highly effective in high-throughput networks. We have a deployed base of over 1,500,000 Next Generation firewalls and sensors that power the SonicWall Capture network. We also offer unique integration between hardware (MIPS / network-optimized Cavium Octeon CPUs) and software (SonicWall’s proprietary hardened SonicOS). These advantages drive unique differentiation in the network security and critical performance for customers involved in Federal government business. Compliance certifications: FIPS 140-2, Common Criteria, UC-APL, Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC), USGv6, IPv6, ICSA, Wi-Fi Alliance Certified, VPAT.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall has full compliance with all Federally required certifications.

Pg Title: SonicWall helps you build retail and hospitality customer confidence with security that exceeds PCI compliance mandates.
Pg Descr: No one is immune to advanced and emerging threats, such as ransomware and encrypted attacks. However, you can protect your locations and customers with a robust, real-time breach prevention system. Our SonicWall Next Generation Firewall with Capture Advanced Threat Protection service gives you greater confidence knowing that even suspicious-looking files are rigorously evaluated before they enter your network.
Feature Img Descr: No one is immune to advanced and emerging threats, such as ransomware and encrypted attacks. That's why retail and hospitality needs SonicWall.

Pg Title: Cost-effective cybersecurity products and services designed specifically for small and medium-sized businesses.
Pg Descr: Small-to-Medium sized businesses (SMBs) are targeted by cybercriminals just like major corps and government. SonicWall has nearly 30 years of experience defending SMBs from malicious cyberattacks. We have refined powerful yet cost-effective end-to-end cybersecurity solutions. Our security solutions protect your business from ransomware, encrypted threats and zero-day attacks, and can be customized to meet the needs of specific security or business objectives.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall is committed to continuous research and innovation that advance our security solutions to small-to-medium sized businesses.

Pg Title: SonicWall provides cost effective advanced security to government organizations
Pg Descr: State and local governments must protect against increasingly targeted and stealthy cyber attacks, while staying within limited budgets. Simultaneously, they need to comply with regulatory mandates. SonicWall solutions block emerging threats, help to meet compliance, ease management and minimize costs.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall solutions block emerging threats, help to meet compliance, ease management - all within limited budgets.

Pg Title: SonicWall Risk Management uncovers threats and gaps in your network with continuous real-time security assessment.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Risk Management tools give you multi-level intelligence for full risk management capability. Innovations like Risk Meters help you detect and defend against live cyberthreats. You have real time analytics, reporting, and Cloud App Security to reduce the risk for shadow IT, or unsanctioned IT applications.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall innovations like Risk Meters help you detect and defend against cyberthreats in real time.

Pg Title: SonicWall Risk Meters provide threat information and risk scoring based on customized data about your network.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Risk Meters use customized threat information and risk scoring to reveal gaps in defensive layers and vulnerabilities. It fosters decisive security planning and enables precise defensive actions. This helps optimize network, cloud, web and endpoint defenses to shrink the threat surface and susceptibility to cyberattacks
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall risk meters will help you prevent unforeseen attacks with real-time monitoring of real-world threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall manages risk and upfront costs with Managed Security Services delivered by our MSSP Partners.
Pg Descr: SonicWall works with Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) to deliver beyond the standard voice, video and data services to include breach prevention and risk management through comprehensive managed security services. Organizations of all sizes can embrace network convergence and cloud computing to drive their growth with better customer experiences and greater satisfaction.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall works with Managed Security Service Providers to help organizations of all sizes embrace network convergence and cloud computing.

Pg Title: SonicWall MSSP Security protects your network with a flexible and affordable service.
Pg Descr: Carriers can deliver beyond the standard voice, video and data services to include breach prevention and risk management through security services.

Pg Title: SonicWall MSSP Partnership protects your network with a range of affordable managed security services.
Pg Descr: SonicWall is working with Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) to deliver beyond the standard voice, video and data services to include breach prevention and risk management through comprehensive managed security services.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall MSSPs offer a broad suite of cyber defense tools and capabilities to extend end-to-end network security.

Pg Title: SonicWall's flexible and affordable Security-as-a-Service subscription-based service.
Pg Descr: Outsource your network security with SonicWall Security-as-a-Service (SECaaS) Partners. It's a service that's designed to be flexible and affordable. It's a subscription-based service bundled by participating SonicWall SECaaS partners who will work with to detect and block a wide range of advanced and emerging threats, including intrusions, viruses, spyware, worms, Trojans, key loggers, rootkits, botnets and zero-day malware.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall SECaaS partners can work with you to create a system that detects and blocks a wide range of advanced and emerging threats.

Pg Title: SonicWall use cases of deployment-ready solutions.
Pg Descr: SonicWall solutions lower TCO and ease deployment with cost-effective zero-touch provisioning, secure Software-Defined WAN (SD-WAN) and seamless API-based cloud security. These solutions secure SaaS applications, enable mobile and global workforce, and extend security into hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall use cases of deployment-ready solutions demonstrate seamless API-based cloud security.

Pg Title: SonicWall NSv Next-generation cloud security is for hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
Pg Descr: SonicWall NSv Next-Generation Virtual Firewall is an industry-leading solution for automated real-time data breach protection, across multiple regions and clouds. Protect your workloads in the cloud with seamless security and management capabilities with a SPOG (single pane of glass) management experience. Take advantage of the agility, scalability, high-performance, lower operational cost, fast time to deployment driving innovation with NSv.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall NSv Next-Generation Virtual Firewall gives you agility, scalability, high-performance, with lower operational cost.

Pg Title: SonicWall Cloud App Security protects email, data and user credentials in your Office 365 ecosystem.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security provides best-in-class advanced threat protection for Office 365 or G Suite. Stop targeted phishing attacks, zero-day threats and email fraud, such as business email compromise and account takeovers. SonicWall CAS also ensures consistent security policies across all SaaS applications, including email, file storage and file sharing.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security provides best-in-class advanced threat protection for Office 365 and G Suite.

Pg Title: SonicWall SaaS Cloud App Security moves you to the cloud in a secure and compliant manner
Pg Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security (CAS) delivers SaaS security for applications, including email, file storage and file sharing. Gain best-in-class advanced threat protection against targeted phishing attacks, zero-day threats, identity fraud and account takeovers. CAS ensures consistent policies across the cloud office suite. Integrated with SonicWall NGFWs, CAS delivers Shadow IT visibility and control.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Cloud App Security (CAS) delivers SaaS security ensures consistent policies across the cloud office suite.

Pg Title: SonicWall Software-Defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN) for highly available and high-performance WANs.
Pg Descr: SonicWall Software-Defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN) technology allows organizations and enterprises with branch locations to build highly available and higher-performance WANs. Maximize low-cost internet access (broadband, 3G/4G/LTE, fiber) for cost-effective replacement of expensive WAN connection technologies such as MPLS. SonicWall SD-WAN delivers comprehensive, industry-leading security solutions that simplify deployments.
Feature Img Descr: SonicWall Software-Defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN) technology delivers comprehensive, industry-leading security solutions that simplify deployments.
